member.name: M:IreckonuFileHandler.Controllers.AuthenticationController.LoginAsync(IreckonuFileHandler.Core.Resource.UserCredentialsResource)
member.summary: This method is used to authenticate users of the API.
member.response: Returns if the operation was successful.
Returns if parameter is not valid.
member.remarks: Access token and Refresh tokens are returned on successful authentication. Kindly add the Access Token to the Authorization header to access protected API method

member.name: M:IreckonuFileHandler.Controllers.AuthenticationController.RefreshTokenAsync(IreckonuFileHandler.Core.Resource.RefreshTokenResource)
member.summary: This method is used to extend the validity of access token issued to users of the API.
member.response: Returns if the operation was successful.
Returns if parameter is not valid.

member.name: M:IreckonuFileHandler.Controllers.AuthenticationController.RevokeToken(IreckonuFileHandler.Core.Resource.RevokeTokenResource)
member.summary: This method is used to revoke the access token issued to users of the API.
member.response: Returns if the operation was successful.
Returns if parameter is not valid.

member.name: M:IreckonuFileHandler.Controllers.UploadController.UploadAsync
member.summary: This method is used to process file upload
member.response: Returns if the operation was successful.
Returns if file uploaded is invalid.

member.name: M:IreckonuFileHandler.Controllers.UploadController.List
member.summary: This method is used to fetch the details of all products .
member.response: Returns if the operation was successful.
Returns if there are no products.

member.name: M:IreckonuFileHandler.Controllers.UsersController.CreateUserAsync(IreckonuFileHandler.Core.Resource.UserCredentialsResource)
member.summary: This method is used to register user to obtain access to the API.
member.response: Returns if the operation was successful.
Returns if parameter is not valid.
